definition: elaborate, as of theories and hypotheses
details:
verb
- elaborate, as of theories and hypotheses
= synonyms: develop
- put into words or an expression
= example: put into words or an expression
= synonyms: phrase
- to come up with an idea, plan, explanation, theory, or principle after a mental effort
= example: to come up with an idea, plan, explanation, theory, or principle after a mental effort
= synonyms: devise
- prepare according to a formula
